entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (tatooine_privateer_trainer_shamdon.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_106: Well, we've got some bad news, %NU.
entries.s_119: Well, we've got some bad news, %NU.
entries.s_126: Alright. Come see me when you're ready.
entries.s_134: Well, we've got some bad news, %NU.
entries.s_141: Alright. Come see me when you're ready.
entries.s_148: Well, we've got some bad news, %NU.
entries.s_154: Alright. Come see me when you're ready.
entries.s_181: You'd better go talk to Talon Karrde. I have a feeling he's made some promises to Jabba on your behalf.
entries.s_1b1dd9b4: What do you think? Did you eliminate that pirate?
entries.s_1f4922ce: %NU, you'd make an excellent pirate. Ready for another assignment?
entries.s_2118caa8: Ha ha! Well that's none of your business now, is it? You go on now and find something useful to do.
entries.s_237: You are going to learn about advanced starfighters. Are you ready?
entries.s_238: You're going to learn about intermediate starship component use. Are you ready?
entries.s_239: You're going to learn about starship defense training. Are you ready?
entries.s_240: You're going to learn about reactor engineering algorithms.
entries.s_249: Good choice. Your new abilities will come in handy soon. Are you ready for your next assignment?
entries.s_253: Excellent. Our shipments to Dantooine have been blocked by a surprisingly competent Imperial patrol. I need you to go destroy it so we can resume operations there.
entries.s_257: Alright. Come see me when you're ready.
entries.s_259: Good choice. Are you ready for your next assignment?
entries.s_263: Excellent. This is a very special assignment! Jabba's pirates have been cracking down on our smuggling operations in Tatooine and we're having problems getting shipments out of the system. I want you to escort one of our transports out of the system... and watch out for the Hutts!
entries.s_2640d39c: You know Lady Valarian and Jabba are... 'competitors'... so to speak. Right?
entries.s_267: Alright. Come see me when you're ready.
entries.s_269: Good choice. Are you ready for your next assignment?
entries.s_273: Excellent. This is a special assignment. The Black Sun pirates are trying to move in on our territory. They been blocking our operations in the Yavin system. I want you to go there and destroy the Black Sun leader. Once he's out of the picture we'll own smuggling there.
entries.s_277: Alright. Come see me when you're ready.
entries.s_279: Good choice. No doubt that will come in handy soon. Are you ready for your next assignment?
entries.s_283: Excellent. I want you to head Lok and destroy a Canyon Corsair Behemoth. This pirate's been trying to block our shipments to Nym... and we just can't have that.
entries.s_287: Alright. Come see me when you're ready.
entries.s_2b2c40c1: I knew you could handle it. Ready for another assignment?
entries.s_2e6c7754: Oh you must be Talon Karrde's new man. Thanks for this. Here's the money Talon and I agreed upon.
entries.s_36bdb4df: I don't know why you're talking to me... do I know you? Why are you here?
entries.s_383435: You've done an excellent job for me, %NU. I can see that you are ready for more training.
entries.s_3b48f08: That Canyon Corsair leader needs to be taken out! He's responsible for our lost transports in the Lok system. Go defeat him!
entries.s_3c3002fc: Oh, I don't think so. The only people doing jobs for me are from Talon Karrde's outfit. And if Talon sent you, you'd have something for me.
entries.s_4: I'm not sure who you are, but you don't look like someone I want to talk to.
entries.s_4362ba26: The Imperial Pilot has been neutralized.
entries.s_44: Well, we've got some bad news, %NU.
entries.s_52e7e5e: You'd better go talk to Talon Karrde. I have a feeling he's made some promises to Jabba on your behalf.
entries.s_5423b2d0: Right! Help our shipments get through to Lok without being hijacked by those Canyon Corsairs.
entries.s_55: Alright. Well come see me when you're ready.
entries.s_57adb96: Who knew you'd make such a good pirate, %NU? Ready for another assignment?
entries.s_59: Well, we've got some bad news, %NU.
entries.s_5ad49b89: Alright. Well come see me when you're ready.
entries.s_5af9448: Good. There are a number of things you can do for me. What can you do for me right now?
entries.s_5d262b71: You are here for work now, yes?
entries.s_5f96d75a: %NU, don't be naive. This is Tatooine. Everyone cares what Jabba wants. More importantly, Talon Karrde cares, so you better care too.
entries.s_6: I don't know who you are, but you don't look like someone I want to talk to!
entries.s_63227fe4: You're probably right. Ready for another assignment?
entries.s_66: Alright. Well come see me when you're ready.
entries.s_666ebdc8: Excellent. Our shipments to Dantooine have been blocked by a surprisingly competent Imperial patrol. I need you to go destroy it so we can resume operations there.
entries.s_66b1a06f: Alright. Come see me when you're ready.
entries.s_69e17dd2: I'm sure I'll have more for you if you're up to doing some more jobs... or say, if you'd like to flip for that. What do you say, double or nothing?
entries.s_6e21ce1c: Talon thinks Jabba's going to put a death-mark on him... because of you!
entries.s_73: Well, we've got some bad news, %NU.
entries.s_739845d3: No... especially not for the likes of you. Go find your own contacts.
entries.s_75: Fantastic! %NU, I knew I could count on you. Ready for another assignment?
entries.s_75d43a2b: Well apparently you've been just a little TOO successful, working for Lady Valarian. Jabba wants Talon Karrde to work for him, and only for him.
entries.s_7cb248ee: Did it go alright? Any problems?
entries.s_81: Alright. Well come see me when you're ready.
entries.s_88: Well, we've got some bad news, %NU.
entries.s_89555084: Excellent. I want you to head Lok and destroy a Canyon Corsair Behemoth. This pirate's been trying to block our shipments to Nym... and we just can't have that.
entries.s_90: Fantastic! %NU, I knew I could count on you. Ready for another assignment?
entries.s_90a85d36: A smart-looking girl like you ought to be able to figure that on your own. You go on now and interrogate someone else, alright?
entries.s_93ba78e7: Kill Black Sun Pirates in Yavin.
entries.s_96: Alright. Well come see me when you're ready.
entries.s_9839c24f: Eh... I may be making a mistake, but you've got that look about you... like you might make a good smuggler one day. Yes, I do have some duty missions. What do you think you can handle?
entries.s_98adf66d: I can see you're busy. Come talk to me when you've got some time. I can always use your services.
entries.s_9939e2d7: A smart-looking boy like you ought to be able to figure that on your own. You go on now and interrogate someone else, alright?
entries.s_9b0ac27a: Jabba sent a thug over to have a little 'talk' with Talon Karrde. He's a little spooked, I think.
entries.s_9eb35e93: Good thinking. The Imperial patrols there are making it difficult to operate, but if we can cut down on the amount of legal traffic, demand for our services will soar!
entries.s_9fa5f777: Excellent! They've been moving in on our operations for just a little too long. Go to the Yavin system and wipe them out!
entries.s_a07f4bc4: Excellent. This is a very special assignment! Jabba's pirates have been cracking down on our smuggling operations in Tatooine and we're having problems getting shipments out of the system. I want you to escort one of our transports out of the system... and watch out for the Hutts!
entries.s_a24306df: There's no way we're going to allow the Black Sun to move in on our operations! Get back to the Yavin system and destroy that ship before it's too late!
entries.s_ae1a4b87: Our contacts on Dantooine are getting nervous. You have to destroy that Imperial patrol before our customers decide to take their business elsewhere. Now get out there are finish the job!
entries.s_aed52b48: Yes, I'm here to do a job for you.
entries.s_b4790825: I don't know why you're talking to me... do I know you?
entries.s_bce510d4: Alright, but you'd better be ready soon. Hurry back.
entries.s_c1ff5062: I'm looking for a mission. Do you have any?
entries.s_c29ec5c2: Well, we've got some bad news, %NU.
entries.s_c562c4fb: Oh, I guess you're the new woman working for Talon Karrde's outfit. Here's the payment Talon and I agreed upon.
entries.s_cbe97427: Then stop bothering me. Can't you see I'm busy?
entries.s_d4079379: That's what makes you such a good pilot. Ready for another assignment?
entries.s_d6924ee9: Welcome back, %NU. Are you ready to get back to work?
entries.s_d70e2c34: Excellent. This is a special assignment. The Black Sun pirates are trying to move in on our territory. They been blocking our operations in the Yavin system. I want you to go there and destroy the Black Sun leader. Once he's out of the picture we'll own smuggling there.
entries.s_d9b1bd09: Nice work with that Corsair leader. Maybe that'll teach those guys to steer clear of our transports. I've got your payment right here.
entries.s_dab97824: I don't know who you are, but you don't look like someone I want to talk to.
entries.s_dffe951a: Fantastic! %NU, I knew I could count on you. Ready for another assignment?
entries.s_e4c0ecd: We can't afford any more mistakes! It's only a matter of time before Jabba figures out you're working for me. Now go escort our transport so it can make it out of the system!
entries.s_f1bbe36f: Don't get too full of yourself. It's a dangerous world, you know? Ready for another assignment?
